      • setOnErrorListener

        public void setOnErrorListener(IMediaPlayer.OnErrorListener l)
        Register a callback to be invoked when an error occurs during playback or setup. If no listener is specified, or if the listener returned false, CMVideoView will inform the user of any errors.
        参数:
        l - The callback that will be run
